entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ucluelet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 2:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 7.7°C
Wind: ESE 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023
